title: Start Up Cannabis Nation
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Israel is the largest consumer of medical cannabis in the world, but regulatory progress towards full legalization is moving slowly.Saul Kaye, CEO and founder of iCAN, talks Israel's rapidly developing cannabis market and why regulators shouldn't forget the underground market. Setting up supply chains in Israel and Europe. Psychedelics, cannabis and treating mental health. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
